venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest-- East Entrance

item.description:
The Friends Trail runs from the Myles Standish State Forest east entrance at Long Pond Road.  It is a 4 mile trail. (The image is from a Google Earth file called "Modified Friends Trail file" stored by member Stephen Travis from a May 1, 2011 hike.  (You have to have Google Earth installed for it to work.)

Please wear good hiking shoes and bring water/snacks and tick and sunscreen protection.

Breakfast at 8:30 at Panera Bread at the Shops at Five (Exit 5 off Route 3) in Plymouth.  All are welcome to join us.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club- Friends Trail
